turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated! I'm trying to figure out why my account balance is lower than I expected. Can you help me check my recent transactions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you with that. To access your transaction history, please confirm your account number and the last four digits of your social security number. Alternatively, you can log into our mobile app or website for instant access.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, account number is 1234567890 and the last four of my social are 4321. Once you've checked, can you also tell me what the bank's policy is on overdraft fees? I'm trying to understand if I was charged correctly. And why are they so high anyway?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for providing that information. I see a recent debit card transaction for $50 at 'Joe's Cafe' and a recurring charge of $25 to 'Streaming Services Inc.' on the 15th of this month. Regarding overdraft fees, our policy is a $35 fee per transaction that overdraws the account. These fees are in place to cover the cost associated with processing transactions when sufficient funds are not available. The exact reasoning for the amount is complex, influenced by factors such as regulatory compliance and risk management. More details are available in the account agreement document on our website.
